languages.text: "Как странно... ведь вы — духовник господина Беллардо, Капеллан? Разве мог кто-то, кроме вас, назначить ему покаяние?"
"How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"
languages.original_text: "Как странно... ведь вы — духовник господина Беллардо, Капеллан? Разве мог кто-то, кроме вас, назначить ему покаяние?"

traits.locale_text: "How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"
"How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"
"How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"
"How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"
"How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"

languages.text: “这就太奇怪了……你不就是贝拉多大师的告解者吗，牧师？除了你之外，怎么还会有别人告诉他要忏悔呢？”
languages.original_text: "How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"

traits.locale_text: “这就太奇怪了……你不就是贝拉多大师的告解者吗，牧师？除了你之外，怎么还会有别人告诉他要忏悔呢？”

languages.text: «Qué extraño... ¿No es usted el confesor del maestro Bellardo, Capellán? ¿Quién, si no usted, puede haberle guiado al arrepentimiento?».
languages.original_text: "How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"

traits.locale_text: «Qué extraño... ¿No es usted el confesor del maestro Bellardo, Capellán? ¿Quién, si no usted, puede haberle guiado al arrepentimiento?».

languages.text: 「変だな…教戒官、あなたはマスター・ベラルドの懺悔師であろう？彼に『後悔しろ』などと言う者は、あなた以外にいないのでは？」
languages.original_text: "How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"

traits.locale_text: 「変だな…教戒官、あなたはマスター・ベラルドの懺悔師であろう？彼に『後悔しろ』などと言う者は、あなた以外にいないのでは？」

languages.text: "Merkwürdig ... wart Ihr nicht Meister Bellardos Beichtvater, Ordenspriester? Wie hätte jemand außer Euch ihn anweisen können, Buße zu tun?"
languages.original_text: "How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"

traits.locale_text: "Merkwürdig ... wart Ihr nicht Meister Bellardos Beichtvater, Ordenspriester? Wie hätte jemand außer Euch ihn anweisen können, Repentanz zu üben?"

languages.text: « Étrange... N'étiez-vous pas le confesseur de maître Bellardo, Chapelain ? Qui d'autre que vous aurait bien pu lui dire de se repentir ? »
languages.original_text: "How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"

traits.locale_text: « Étrange... N'étiez-vous pas le confesseur de maître Bellardo, Chapelain ? Qui d'autre que vous aurait bien pu lui dire de se repentir ? »

languages.text: "Ne tuhaf. Üstat Bellardo'nun günahlarını sen çıkarmıyor muydun Papaz? Senden başka kim ona tövbe etmesini söyleyecek ki?"
languages.original_text: "How strange... aren't you Master Bellardo's confessor, Chaplain? How could anyone other than you have told him to repent?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne tuhaf. Sen Üstat Bellardo'nun günah çıkaranı değil misin Papaz? Senden başka kim ona günah çıkarmasını söyleyecek ki?"
